13585.「いやあ ワリーワリー。\n 魔物以外と からむの ひさしぶりでよ。\n つい:
Well, wally wally. It's been a long time since
I've been with someone other than a monster.
I'm getting a little carried away.

13586.「オレの名は チャムール。\n そして こいつらは オレの仕事仲間だ。:
My name is Chamour. And these are my business
associates.

13587.「そう……。この オレこそが\n 悪名高き つむじ風の旅団を束ねる\n ヘッドな:
So I am the head of the infamous Whirlwind
Brigade.

13588.「おいおい。そう構えるなよ。\n アンタも 盗賊なんだろ？\n 同業者同士 仲良:
Oh, come on. Don't get so cocky. You're a
thief too, right? Let's get along as
colleagues, shall we?

13589.「アンタが ここに来た理由も 察しがつくぜ。\n おおかた ブデチョのオヤジに\:
I can guess why you are here. I'm guessing
that Budecho's dad asked you to do something
for him, right?

13590.「へっへっへ 図星だな？\n 確かに あいつが大事にしていたもんは\n オレがあ:
Heh heh heh. You got me right, didn't you?
Indeed, I'm taking care of the things he
cherished.

13591.「すぐに返してやっても いいんだが……\n それじゃあ イマイチ 面白くねえよな:
I'd give it back to you in a heartbeat, but
that wouldn't be much fun, would it?

13592.「どうだ？ ひとつ アンタのウデ前\n オレに 見せちゃくれないか？\n 義賊っ:
How's that? How about you show me what you're
made of? You know, show me what a good soldier
is like...<yesno><close>

13593.「おいおい。それじゃ いつまでたっても\n ブデチョが探してるもんは 手に入らね:
Hey, hey. Platypunk won't get what he's
looking for forever, will he?

13594.「よしよし。いい返事だ。\n それじゃあ アンタには ぬすむを使って\n 魔物か:
Good, good. That's a good answer. Well then,
I'll have you use Half-Inch to steal the
treasure from the monsters.

13595.「盗んでくるのは ウェナ諸島の\n ヴェリナード領南にいる <%sEV_QUE_:
Steal a Golden Scallop belonging to Scallop
Wallaby in Verinard South, Wena Islands.

13596.「ぬすむを成功させ 戦闘に勝ち 黄金ホタテを\n 手に入れたら また ここに戻っ:
If you succeed in Half-Inch, win the battle, and receive the Golden Scallop, come back here again. I'll give you back what Budecho is
looking for.

13598.「おう。どうしたんだ？\n オレの言ったことを やってこない限り\n ブデチョが:
Oh. What's going on? Unless you do what I told
you, I won't give you back what Budecho is
looking for.

13599.「いいか？ ウェナ諸島の\n ヴェリナード領南で <%sEV_QUE_NAME0:
Remember? Go to Verinard South, Wena Islands,
and steal a Golden Scallop from Scallop
Wallaby.

13600.「ぬすむを成功させ 戦闘に勝ち 黄金ホタテを\n 手に入れたら また ここに戻っ:
If you succeed in Half-Inch, win the battle, and receive the Golden Scallop, come back here again. I'll give you back what Budecho is
looking for.

13601.「……へっへっへ オレはよ。\n アンタみてえな 正義をふりかざした\n 義賊の:
I'd like to see a righteous bandit like you.
I'd like to see a righteous bandit like you,
pretending to be a man of justice.

13602.「おっ 早かったじゃねえか。\n どうだ 目当てのもんは 手に入ったか？:
Hey, you're early. How'd you get what you
wanted?

13603.チャムールに 黄金ホタテを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Would you give Chamour the Golden Scallop?<yesno><close>

13604.「おいおい。それじゃ いつまでたっても\n ブデチョが探してるもんは 手に入らね:
Hey, hey. Platypunk won't get what he's
looking for forever, will he?

13606.「ほう なかなか やるじゃねえか。\n こいつは 盗もうったって\n そう簡単に:
Well, that's pretty good, isn't it? It's not
so easy to steal this thing, you know.

13607.「アンタ…… いいウデ前だな。\n うちに 入らねえか？\n 義賊なんかしてたん:
You... you're good at what you do. Why don't
you join us? It would be a shame to waste your
time as a bandit.<yesno><close>

13608.「ギャッハッハッハ！ ジョークだよ ジョーク！\n オレは かたぎを気取ったヤツ:
Gah! It's a joke, a joke! I've decided I won't
work with anyone who pretends to be a cripple.

13609.「でもよ 約束は守るぜ。\n オルゴールの中身は ブデチョのオヤジに\n ちゃん:
But I'll keep my promise. I will return the
contents of Music Box to Budecho's father.

13610.「しかも 出血大サービスだ。\n このオレが ヤツの所へ行って\n 直接 手渡し:
What's more, it's a bleeding service. I'll go
to him and hand it to him myself.

13611.「……ブデチョの野郎。\n こいつを見せても ピンとこない盗賊を\n わざわざ:
Budecho. It's like he went to the trouble of
sending us a thief who doesn't look right when
we show him this.

13612.「ヤツの化けの皮 はがしてやるから\n アンタも 見にこいよ。\n 見ものだぜ～:
I'm going to peel off his skin, so you should
come and see. It's going to be a spectacle!

13616.「よう 親父 ひさしぶりだな。\n ……だらしなく ブクブク太ってるとこ見ると\:
Hey, Dad, it's been a while. ...Seeing how you've been getting fat and sloppy, it looks like you haven't been living a very good life
since then.

13617.「おらよっ！ 母さんのオルゴールに入ってた\n これ 返してやらぁ。:
Hey! I'll give you back this that was in Mom's
Music Box.

13618.<if_woman>「自分の正体が バレないよう\n そこの ねえちゃん 使うな:
It's so tacky of you to use that girl to keep your identity secret, you... You're so lame that you're using that
girl to keep your identity from being...

13619.「なんとか言ったらどうだ！\n 天下の盗賊王……\n マスク・ド・ムーチョさんよ:
Say something! The king of all thieves... the
Masc de Mucho!

13620.「……オレは 知ってて\n オルゴールを 奪わせたわけじゃないぜ？\n ただ 母:
I didn't knowingly let you take the Music Box,
okay? I just wanted the memory of my mother.

13621.「だから あのオルゴールから\n そいつが出てきたときは\n さすがに 自分の目:
So when that guy came out of that Music Box, I
did a double-take.

13622.「その かいとうの仮面は ムーチョの\n トレードマーク……。まさか 自分の父親:
That mask is Mucho's trademark... I never
thought my father was the Masc de Mucho!

13625.「オレは…… あの日のこと\n 一生 忘れねえからな……！: I'll never forget what happened that day.

13627.「……すまない。聞かせてもらったよ。: I'm sorry. I had to ask.

13628.「アンタが あの伝説の義賊\n マスク・ド・ムーチョだったなんて……。\n 今の:
Is it true that you are the legendary Masc de
Mucho?

13629.「やれやれ……。\n 聞かれてしまっては しょうがない。: Oh dear... I can't help it if they ask.

13630.「いかにも ワシが マスク・ド・ムーチョさ。\n ガタラの町長の家に 盗みに入っ:
I am, indeed, the Masc de Mucho. I've been out
of work for years, ever since I robbed the
mayor's house in Gatara.

13631.「もしかして チャムールの言っていた\n あの日ってのは……。マスク・ド・ムーチ:
Could it be that the day Chamour was referring
to was the last day of work for Masc de Mucho?

13632.「ああ そうだ。\n 町長の家に盗みに入った あの日な……。\n ワシは……:
Oh, yes. The day I robbed the mayor's house I
was...

13633.「ワシは チャムールの母親を\n 見殺しにしてしまったんだ……。: I left Chamour's mother to die...

13635.「それについては もう 何も言いたくはない。\n ともかく……:
I don't want to say anything more about that.
Anyway...

13636.「それ以来 あやつは 義賊を憎むようになった。\n 義を かかげた者が なぜ\n:
Since then, he came to hate the righteous bandit. He wondered why a man who had done so much for the sake of righteousness had left
his mother to die...

13637.「そして 義賊を 偽善者と呼び\n マスク・ド・ムーチョへの復讐を誓って\n 行:
He called the bandits hypocrites and swore
vengeance on the Masc de Mucho and
disappeared...

13638.「弁解の余地は ない。\n あやつを 悪の道へと進ませたのは\n まぎれもなく:
There is no excuse. I am the one who set him
on his evil path.

13639.「とんでもないことが わかっちまったね……。\n とりあえず あたいは 酒場に戻:
I'm going back to the tavern for now, so
you'll have to come back later.
